snippet: Researchers have found genetic weak spots in colon cancer tumors that could lead to potent treatments, signaling hope against a cancer that is now almost always fatal once it spreads.
abstract: More than 200 researchers investigating colon cancer tumors have found genetic vulnerabilities that could lead to powerful new treatments; hope is that drugs designed to strike these weak spots will eventually stop a cancer that is now almost inevitably fatal once it has spread.
lead_paragraph: Researchers have found genetic weak spots in colon cancer tumors that could lead to potent treatments, signaling hope against a cancer that is now almost always fatal once it spreads.

headline.seo: Vast Gene Study Raises Hopes for Colon Cancer Drugs
headline.main: Genetic Aberrations Seen as Path to Stop Colon Cancer
headline.print_headline: In Gene Study, A Map to Fight Colon Cancer
